body: There is a rider joke here
Thanks for the translation. This is hella spicy.

Wait Cyclone x Joker?
Cyclone....
Joker....
Henshin....

Awesome, thank you very much.
I, as someone who wants to translate stuff too, am uncertain...unsure...if i shouls approach the translation in a professional neutral way like you did, or if i should get a tiny bit more literal, so to not lose much in translation, including pauses and even those indicators of speech/thought difficulty of the heroine, etc
